title: Experiments in the Periphery: Nomadic Listening
short: interactive sonic works for outdoor spaces by John Teske and Robert Blatt
long: I will be presenting a version of nomadic patterns, where I lead the performer-audience in an exploratory sonic investigation of the site. Blatt will be presenting his piece Walking Listening, which uses microcontrollers with GPS, LCD screens, and loudspeakers to algorithmically generate walks for participants to encourage increasingly abstract forms of listening.
address:
A.D. Barnes Park
3401 SW 72nd Ave
Miami, FL
